downloadTitle: Microsoft Exchange Hosted Filtering and Exchange Hosted Archive 8.1 QuickLaunch Guide
downloadDescription: This document describes how to set up Exchange Hosted Filtering and Exchange Hosted Archive 8.1.

downloadFile.name: Setting Up Forefront Online Security for Exchange Hosted Filtering and Exchange Hosted Archive 8.1.doc
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/7/d/a/7daaa654-fd0a-443f-a9c3-121f1bc66bd5/Setting Up Forefront Online Security for Exchange Hosted Filtering and Exchange Hosted Archive 8.1.doc

detailsSection: Use this document if you are using Exchange Hosted Archive 8.1. If you are using a later version, please see the related documents for more up-to-date information.
detailsSection_file_name: Setting Up Forefront Online Security for Exchange Hosted Filtering and Exchange Hosted Archive 8.1.doc
systemRequirementsSection:
Supported Operating Systems: Windows Vista; Windows XP
The file is a Microsoft Word document. Users who do not have Microsoft Word can view this document through the downloadable Word Viewer.
installInstructionSection:
Click the Download button on this page to start the download, or choose a different language from the drop-down list and click Go. 
Do one of the following: 
To start the installation immediately, click Open or Run this program from its current location. 
To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save or Save this program to disk.
